CustomField.description:
The SOQL statement that will be executed if the named query is referenced by another query.
Maximum length is 20k characters, see this link for details: http://salesforce.stackexchange.com/questions/25719/what-is-the-maximum-number-of-items-in-a-soql-in-clause
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The SOQL statement that will be executed when the named query is referenced by another query.
CustomField.label: SOQL Statement
